name: Orballin VR
description:
What is Orballin?

Orballin is a game designed to crunch 100 hours of vr sickness into about 15 minutes. Everything is designed to be as bad as possible, just like this page. After this, no other vr game will make you sick, or your money back. 

But what do you do in Orballin?

There is an evil rock that you have to throw out, but you are a half orb half ball at the big wood spire zone in space. It is up to you to throw the rock into the trash to stop it from being evil and stuff, and you have a little hand and a heart shaped pan. Oh, and you cant move your fingers because you ate glue.

Updates

1.3.2: Ending has lite seizure warning. Nothing too bad, but still. 

1.3.1: No more reload with R, now just fall.

1.2.9: Some more stuff.

1.2.8: The hand is back and the pop bug is fixed.

1.2.7: New ending music.

1.2.6: Added some signs and more walls.

1.2.5: Hand is no longer cube, now it is a real hand.

1.2.4: I lied in 1-2-3, but now its fixed for real.

1.2.3: Well 1-2-2 didn't work. So I fixed it.

1.2.2: Added some walls and stuff.

1.2.1: The game is now done and works!

1.1.9: It still isn't working.

1.1.8: It stopped working.

1.1.7: It should be a little easier to play now.

1.1.5: The game actually works now.

1.1.2: The game works now.

1.1.1: The game is out.
